presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.presentation: My name is Loïc Payol, I'm __age__ year old, and I've been learning web development and more for __experience__ years. Curious, I'm always trying to learn more about existing technologies. Javascript, assembly, multimedia or programming on calculator, I explore all branches of computer sciences within my reach. I love work and share in team and my biggest passion is IT science.

bachelor_degree.name: Scientific Baccalauréat (French secondary school diploma), mathematics speciality

computers.desc: It has been __experience__ years that I discovered programming and I will never get tired of it.

projects.title: Projects
projects.lightapi: A framework for light, fast and reliables websites with NodeJS.
